mapper.select: select INVOICE_ID, LINE_NUMBER, PROJECT_ID, VENDOR_ID, VENDOR_NAME, PROJECT_NUM, PAYMENT_DATE, EXPENDITURE_TYPE, CURRENCY_CODE, AMOUNT, BASE_AMOUNT, STATUS, null REQUEST_ID, null PROGRAM_ID, null OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, null CREATED_BY, null CREATION_DATE, null LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, null LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN from cux_req_for_pending_payment_v4@ebs_db purchase where purchase.LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= #{lastUpdateDate}

select purchase.PAYMENT_ID, purchase.INVOICE_ID, purchase.LINE_NUMBER, purchase.PROJECT_ID, purchase.VENDOR_ID, purchase.VENDOR_NAME, purchase.PROJECT_NUM, purchase.PAYMENT_DATE, purchase.EXPENDITURE_TYPE, purchase.CURRENCY_CODE, purchase.AMOUNT, purchase.BASE_AMOUNT, purchase.STATUS,
from HCUX_EPS_PAYMENT_DETAIL purchase where purchase.INVOICE_ID=#{invoiceId} and purchase.LINE_NUMBER=#{lineNumber} and purchase.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId} and purchase.VENDOR_ID=#{vendorId}

select purchase.PAYMENT_ID, purchase.INVOICE_ID, purchase.LINE_NUMBER, purchase.PROJECT_ID, purchase.VENDOR_ID, purchase.VENDOR_NAME, purchase.PROJECT_NUM, purchase.PAYMENT_DATE, purchase.EXPENDITURE_TYPE, purchase.CURRENCY_CODE, purchase.AMOUNT, purchase.BASE_AMOUNT, purchase.STATUS,
from HCUX_EPS_PAYMENT_DETAIL purchase
AND purchase.STATUS = '已付'
and lower(purchase.PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and purchase.VENDOR_NAME like '%'||#{vendorName}||'%'
and to_char(purchase.PAYMENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_char(#{paymentDateFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_char(purchase.PAYMENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_char(#{paymentDateTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and purchase.EXPENDITURE_TYPE = #{expenditureType}
AND purchase.AMOUNT != 0
order by purchase.PAYMENT_DATE desc,purchase.PAYMENT_ID desc

select purchase.CURRENCY_CODE CURRENCY_CODE, ROUND(sum(purchase.AMOUNT),2) TOTAL_AMOUNT from HCUX_EPS_PAYMENT_DETAIL purchase
AND purchase.STATUS = '已付'
and lower(purchase.PROJECT_NUM) like '%'|| lower(#{projectNum}) ||'%'
and lower(purchase.PROJECT_NUM) >= lower(#{projectNumFrom})
and lower(purchase.PROJECT_NUM) <= lower(#{projectNumTo})
and purchase.VENDOR_NAME like '%'||#{vendorName}||'%'
and to_char(purchase.PAYMENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_char(#{paymentDateFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_char(purchase.PAYMENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_char(#{paymentDateTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and purchase.EXPENDITURE_TYPE = #{expenditureType}
group by purchase.CURRENCY_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HCUX_EPS_PAYMENT_DETAIL ( PAYMENT_ID, INVOICE_ID, LINE_NUMBER, PROJECT_ID, VENDOR_ID, VENDOR_NAME, PROJECT_NUM, PAYMENT_DATE, EXPENDITURE_TYPE, CURRENCY_CODE, AMOUNT, BASE_AMOUNT, STATUS ) SELECT HCUX_EPS_PAYMENT_DETAIL_S.nextval, INVOICE_ID, LINE_NUMBER, PROJECT_ID, VENDOR_ID, VENDOR_NAME, PROJECT_NUM, PAYMENT_DATE, EXPENDITURE_TYPE, CURRENCY_CODE, AMOUNT, BASE_AMOUNT, STATUS FROM cux_req_for_pending_payment_v4 @ebs_db
mapper.select: select round(sum(amount),2) total_line_amount from cux_req_for_pending_payment_v5@ebs_db where status='已付' and project_num=#{projectNum} and payment_date<to_date('2019/06/01','yyyy/MM/dd') and dis_creation_date>=to_date('2019/06/01','yyyy/MM/dd') and expenditure_type=#{expenditureType} and LAST_UPDATE_DATE>=to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd')
